item.title: Ubuntu18.04/Mysql5.7改成utf8编码
item.description: 问题背景 向MySQL插入中文内容显示问号 原因 Server端的MySQL不支持utf8， 部分是latin1编码格式。 mysql>show variables like "%char%"; +--------------------------------------+----------------------------+ | Variable_name | Value | +--------------------------------------+----------------------------+ | character_set_client | latin1 | | character_set_connection | latin1 | | character_set_database | utf8mb4 | | character_set_filesystem | binary | | character_set_results | latin1 | | character_set_server | latin1 | | character_set_system | utf8 | | character_sets_dir | /usr/share/mysql/charsets/ | | validate_password_special_char_count | 1 | +--------------------------------------+----------------------------+ 9 rows in set (0.02 sec) 解决办法 1、直接登录MySQL改数据库, 但是MySQL重启后，修改会失效。
